SELECT T.TEMPLEID, T.TEMPLETYPE, T.TEMPLETITLE, T.TEMPLECONTENT, T.CREATETIME, T.CREATOR, T.LASTUPDATETIME FROM TD_WF_MESSTEMPLATE T
WHERE 1=1
#if($templeTitle && !$templeTitle.equals("")) AND T.TEMPLETITLE like #[templeTitle] #end
#if($createTime1 && !$createTime1.equals("")) AND T.CREATETIME >= #[createTime1] #end
#if($createTime2 && !$createTime2.equals("")) AND T.CREATETIME <= #[createTime2] #end
#if($templeType && !$templeType.equals("")) AND T.TEMPLETYPE = #[templeType] #end
ORDER BY T.CREATETIME DESC

SELECT T.TEMPLEID, T.TEMPLETYPE, T.TEMPLETITLE, T.TEMPLECONTENT, T.CREATETIME, T.CREATOR, T.LASTUPDATETIME FROM TD_WF_MESSTEMPLATE T
WHERE T.TEMPLETYPE =?

SELECT T.TEMPLEID, T.TEMPLETYPE, T.TEMPLETITLE, T.TEMPLECONTENT, T.CREATETIME, T.CREATOR, T.LASTUPDATETIME FROM TD_WF_MESSTEMPLATE T
WHERE 1=1 AND T.TEMPLEID = ?
INSERT INTO TD_WF_MESSTEMPLATE (TEMPLEID, TEMPLETYPE, TEMPLETITLE, TEMPLECONTENT, CREATETIME, CREATOR) VALUES (#[templeId], #[templeType], #[templeTitle], #[templeContent], SYSDATE, #[creator])
UPDATE TD_WF_MESSTEMPLATE SET TEMPLETITLE = #[templeTitle], TEMPLETYPE = #[templeType], TEMPLECONTENT = #[templeContent], LASTUPDATETIME = SYSDATE WHERE TEMPLEID = #[templeId]
DELETE FROM TD_WF_MESSTEMPLATE A WHERE A.TEMPLEID = ?
SELECT T.* FROM TD_WF_PROC_MESSTEMPLATE T WHERE 1 = 1 AND (T.EMAILTEMPLEID = ? OR T.MESSAGETEMPLEID = ?)
